description: The tmnxMcPathSrcGrpBlkHole event is generated whenever a source,
group(S,G) goes into a black-hole state.

event.Summary: Source group (S,G) changed to black-hole state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathSrcGrpBlkHole TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr s EXAM TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr s EXAM TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlRtrType i 0 TIMETRA-VRTR-MIB::vRtrID i 9999 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex i 1 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathCardSlotNum i 1 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum u 0

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType indicates the address type
of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr indicates the group address of the
multicast channel. Its type is specified by tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType indicates the address type
of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr indicates the source address of the
multicast channel. Its type is specified by tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlRtrType specifies the type of virtual
router.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlRtrType

description: The unique value which identifies this virtual router in the Tmnx
system. The vRtrID value for each virtual router must remain
constant at least from one re-initialization of the system
management processor (CPM) to the next. There will always be at
least one router entry defined by the agent with vRtrID=1 which
represents the transport router.
variables.name: TIMETRA-VRTR-MIB::vRtrID

description: The unique value which identifies this chassis in the system.
The first release of the product only supports a single chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex

description: The unique value which identifies this IOM slot within a chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathCardSlotNum

description: The unique value which identifies this MDA slot within a
specific IOM card in the system. Rows with a tmnxMDASlotNum
value of zero (0) represent the special case of an IOM card
without MDA slots but that instead has its ports directly
on the IOM card itself. In that case, there should be only
that one row entry in the tmnxMDATable for that IOM card.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum

description: The tmnxMcPathSrcGrpBlkHoleClear event is generated whenever a source,
group(S,G) comes out of black-hole state.

event.Summary: Source group (S,G) comes out of black-hole state

objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathSrcGrpBlkHoleClear TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr s EXAM TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType i 0 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr s EXAM TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlRtrType i 0 TIMETRA-VRTR-MIB::vRtrID i 9999 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex i 1 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathCardSlotNum i 1 TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum u 0

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType indicates the address type
of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr indicates the group address of the
multicast channel. Its type is specified by tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddrType.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlGrpAddr

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType indicates the address type
of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr indicates the source address of the
multicast channel. Its type is specified by tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddrType.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlSrcAddr

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlRtrType specifies the type of virtual
router.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlRtrType

description: The unique value which identifies this virtual router in the Tmnx
system. The vRtrID value for each virtual router must remain
constant at least from one re-initialization of the system
management processor (CPM) to the next. There will always be at
least one router entry defined by the agent with vRtrID=1 which
represents the transport router.
variables.name: TIMETRA-VRTR-MIB::vRtrID

description: The unique value which identifies this chassis in the system.
The first release of the product only supports a single chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex

description: The unique value which identifies this IOM slot within a chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathCardSlotNum

description: The unique value which identifies this MDA slot within a
specific IOM card in the system. Rows with a tmnxMDASlotNum
value of zero (0) represent the special case of an IOM card
without MDA slots but that instead has its ports directly
on the IOM card itself. In that case, there should be only
that one row entry in the tmnxMDATable for that IOM card.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum

description: The tmnxMcPathAvailBwLimitReached event is generated when the available
bandwidth limit has reached.
The unique value which identifies this chassis in the system.
The first release of the product only supports a single chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex

description: The unique value which identifies this IOM slot within a chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathCardSlotNum

description: The unique value which identifies this MDA slot within a
specific IOM card in the system. Rows with a tmnxMDASlotNum
value of zero (0) represent the special case of an IOM card
without MDA slots but that instead has its ports directly
on the IOM card itself. In that case, there should be only
that one row entry in the tmnxMDATable for that IOM card.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum

description: The value of tmnxMcPathChlPathType indicates the path type for an
explicit ingress switch fabric multicast path assigned to a multicast
channel.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChlPathType

description: The tmnxMcPathAvailBwValWithinRange event is generated when the
available bandwidth limit falls below the maximum limit and is within
the permitted range.

event.Summary: Path available bandwidth limit fallen below maximum limit and within the permitted range

description: The unique value which identifies this chassis in the system.
The first release of the product only supports a single chassis
in the system.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathChassisIndex

in the system.

that one row entry in the tmnxMDATable for that IOM card.
variables.name: TIMETRA-MCAST-PATH-MGMT-MIB::tmnxMcPathMDASlotNum
